item.title: About
item.description:
I am a Financial Technology student at The Chinese University of Hong Kong, with practical experience across traditional banking institutions and large-scale fintech platforms.

My academic background combines finance, economics, programming, and optimization, while my professional experience spans Hang Seng Bank, Bank of East Asia, and Ant Group.

I am particularly interested in Open Banking, data visualization, and AI-driven financial advisory systems.
